籤詩版本二:
Umnenga uhlala ungatshintshi kwaye ugada umlambo, awukwazi ukuphakama kwaye uthembele phezulu.
Utshintsho olungaqhelekanga kwixesha elizayo, uXu Jun utsiba phezu kwesango ledragoni
詩意:
Le hexagram ibonisa umfanekiso ongatshintshiyo womnenga.
Yiba nomonde de kufike ixesha.
解曰: Kufuneka unyamezele. Yiba nomonde nomonde. Kufuneka ulinde de kufike ixesha. Udumo lusekhona.
籤詩故事一:
◇Su Qin Bu Di
Ngexesha leXesha leMfazwe, uSu Qin, inzalelwane yaseLuoyang, wayenqula uGu Guzi njengomfundisi-ntsapho wakhe.
U-Su Qin wacela uKumkani waseQin waza wabhala amaxesha alishumi elinambini, kodwa uKumkani waseQin akazange amkele ingxabano yakhe. Uthe xa ebuyela endlini yakhe ikrazukile idyasi yoboya ephelelwe yimali, wafika emnyango ethe khunubembe.
USu Qin wayeneentloni kwaye enomsindo, ngoko wafumana iTaigong Yin Fu (incwadi yobugcisa bemfazwe) waza wayifunda enomsindo. Xa uziva udidekile kwaye ukonqena, vele uhlabe ithanga lakho nge-awl kwaye ufunde kwakhona xa kubuhlungu.
Kamva, ithiyori kaHe Cong (He Zong) yasetyenziselwa ukudibanisa amazwe amathandathu ngokuchasene neQin. Waphembelela uKumkani uZhao waza waba yinkulumbuso yamazwe amathandathu.
聖意: Andixolanga ekhaya, ndisafuna ubutyebi, amashwa, ukuthengiselana, umtshato unzima, uLiujia yintsikelelo kwabahamba ngeenyawo, amasimi akhuselekileyo, imisundululu ilungile, izilwanyana ezintandathu azithandeki, abantu abalahlekileyo, izimangalo zoluntu kunye nokufuduka, zilahlekile. izinto, izifo zasemzantsi-mpuma, ukuthandazela ukukhuselwa, iintaba namangcwaba.
